thirdDesignHeaderAboutMe: As a Firat University Software Engineering graduate and Full Stack Developer, I develop scalable and innovative web applications using Java, Spring Boot, and React. A curious Software Engineer who loves learning about every technology and continuous improvement.
headerAboutMe: I'm Ali. As a Firat University Software Engineering graduate and Full Stack Developer, I develop scalable and innovative web applications using Java, Spring Boot, and React. A curious Software Engineer who loves learning about every technology and continuous improvement.
headerText: Would you like to work together? Contact me.
secondHeaderText: As a Firat University Software Engineering graduate and Full Stack Developer, I develop scalable and innovative web applications using Java, Spring Boot, and React. A curious Software Engineer who loves learning about every technology and continuous improvement.
footerText: Let’s work together on your next product.
footerAltText: Got a question or proposal, or just wantto say hello? Go ahead.

projects.name: Teknolojik Pizza
projects.description: The 'Teknolojik Pizza' website was created to provide a thematic experience focused on the digitalization of the food industry, specifically for pizza ordering or delivery simulation. Designed to help users better understand the online food ordering process, the site incorporates an interactive structure to enhance user engagement.

projects.name: WORKINTECH COMMERCE
projects.description: The website 'WORKINTECH COMMERCE' serves as a practical demonstration of an e-commerce platform, showcasing various functionalities such as product listings, a shopping cart, and order management. It is designed for educational purposes, allowing users to understand how e-commerce applications function. The site is built using modern web technologies, including React for the frontend and Vite for development. For further details, you can visit the site directly

projects.name: To-Do App
projects.description: The website 'alinintodolisti' provides a simple and functional to-do list experience for users to organize their tasks. Such applications allow users to organize their tasks, mark them as completed, and track their progress.

projects.name: Ali Yüzbaşı Portfolio
projects.description: The platform is designed to showcase the developer's skills and projects. It provides users with a detailed presentation of the developer's projects, technical abilities, and experiences, allowing potential employers and clients to effectively get to know the developer.

projects.name: MovieDB
projects.description: The site is a platform that allows users to explore and manage movie data. It aims to enhance user experience by offering functions such as searching, listing, and accessing detailed information about films. The developer has utilized modern web technologies like React and Redux to create a dynamic and interactive interface. The application retrieves updated content via an API. For more information, you can visit the site.

personelInfo.education: Firat University, Software Engineering, Bachelor's Degree, 2022
personelInfo.aboutMe: I was born on January 20, 1999 in Aksaray/Ortaköy and spent the early years of my education there. I completed my undergraduate education in Software Engineering at Firat University and graduated in 2022. During my education, I had the opportunity to develop myself by researching different programming languages, developing projects, and completing internships. After graduation, I completed my military service as Test and Evaluation Section Chief at the MSÜ Information Processing Department SOME Branch. Afterwards, I advanced my career by receiving training from experts through the Full-Stack Development Bootcamp from Workintech. Now, I aim to further advance my career by learning new technologies and improving myself in the software field.
